props.name: scroll
props.description: Makes the header scroll with the content

props.name: waterfall
props.description: Allows a "waterfall" effect with multiple header lines

props.name: waterfallHideTop
props.description: Hides the top rather than the bottom rows on a waterfall header

props.name: transparent
props.description: Makes header transparent (draws on top of layout background)

props.name: seamed
props.description: Uses a header without a shadow

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the layout header content and can contain HTML
